comments: Not an easy course, but she\'s a GREAT teacher. She\'s fair, understanding, and enthusiastic. I learned alot from her so i\'m taking her again for accounting 2302.

GREAT!!! had her for 1:50-3:05. After I had straight classes from 8am she kept me interested with her inhuman amount of positive energy. Accounting is a VERY dry course but she keeps it interesting and motivating. Sign up for her class before it fills up!!!

Excellent professor...highly recommend. She is very fair, friendly, & helpful. Pay attention, show up for class, do the homework to make sure you understand concepts. If you don\'t understand something, ask her...she will go over material again to make sure you understand. Took her for ACCT 2301 also. Great classes!
Awesome teacher! The class itself has some hard concepts but she is very helpful and makes sure everyone understands it before moving on.

Mrs. Duesing is an amazing teacher if you are going to take accounting this is the teacher to take it with. Don\'t expect to go in and make an easy grade you have to work for it but she helps you along the way. Read the book and do the self examination questions and make sure you go over the quizzes online. Great class and teacher!!

She was extremely helpful and very clear. She made acct. seem easy, She goes over the information very well to where you will understand it. The quiz she gives you, comes straight off line, word for word. And the test are from problems out of the book or homework. Awesome professor!
